Class OneMinuteLamp

    Lamp 

    public final class OneMinuteLamp
extends java.lang.Object
    Lamp representing the one minute duration on the Berlin Clock.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OneMinuteLamp

        public OneMinuteLamp(LocalTime localTime,
             int position)
        Constructs a lamp representing one minute on the Berlin Clock.
        Parameters:
        localTime - the LocalTime of the day, not null.
        position - the index of the lamp in its row, greater then 0 and less then 5.

    • Method Detail

      • state

        public char state()
        The state of the lamp
        Returns:
        'O' if the lamp is off, 'Y' if the lamp is on.
